articles.author: Murray Kinsella
articles.title: Leinster storm into European semi-final after overcoming 14-point deficit in Exeter - The42
articles.description: Leo Cullen’s men beat the defending champions to surge into the final four of the Champions Cup.
articles.content:
Exeter 22
Leinster 34
NINE MINUTES IN, Leinster looked like they were in real trouble. Trailing 14 points to the defending European Champions on their home patch, Leo Cullens men left themselves wi… [+7748 chars]

articles.author: The National
articles.title: US regulator says 'no causal link' between Johnson & Johnson vaccine and blood clots - The National
articles.description: The statement from the US Food and Drug Administration comes amid an ongoing study of the vaccine's safety by European regulators
articles.content: Top US health authorities said on Friday that they have not yet found a "causal" link between Johnson & Johnson's Covid-19 shot and blood clots, as the EU drug regulator probed possible instances… [+4070 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Virus lockdowns around the world as vaccine efforts stumble - Eyewitness News
articles.description: As in India, Europe's stuttering vaccine roll-out faced multiple hurdles Friday as EU regulators said they were reviewing side effects of the Johnson & Johnson shot and France further limited its use of the AstraZeneca jab.
articles.content: As in India, Europe's stuttering vaccine roll-out faced multiple hurdles Friday as EU regulators said they were reviewing side effects of the Johnson & Johnson shot and France further limited its… [+4836 chars]

articles.author: Rafi Letzter
articles.title: Two satellites might collide at 32,000 mph over the Arctic today - Livescience.com
articles.description: There's a 20% chance of a disastrous collision, according to the European Union.
articles.content: There's a one-in-five chance of two large satellites colliding at a relative velocity of 32,679 mph (52,592 km/h) over the Siberian Arctic Friday (April 9) an event that would scatter 2.1 tons (1,900… [+2752 chars]

articles.title: How worried should we be about links of blood clots to AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine? - CNA
